CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is manually set. This currency field is used to specify the current borrower balance as shown on the institution's General Ledger. This field is used for reporting purposes only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Borrower's General Ledger Balance. Typically equals Principal Balance of the Loan. Exceptions are non-accrual, and charge-offs.
CustomField.label: Borrower GL Balance
